name: Handshake Office
description: The Office handshake meme - showing disproportionate praise for simple actions

text_areas.recommended_text: My parents thanking me for fixing the router
text_areas.usage: The person/entity offering praise or thanks

text_areas.recommended_text: Me when I just unplug and plug it again
text_areas.usage: The person doing the simple/unimpressive action

usage_rules: CONTEXT: From The Office episode 'Nepotism' - a formal handshake between mismatched characters
LEFT TEXT: The person/entity offering excessive praise, thanks, or respect
RIGHT TEXT: The person who did something very simple or basic to earn that praise
TONE: Highlights the contrast between formal recognition and minimal effort
BEST FOR: Situations where simple actions receive disproportionate appreciation
cultural_context: From The Office S7E1 'Nepotism', showing a handshake between two mismatched characters. The humor comes from the contrast between the formal, professional handshake and the often trivial action that prompted it.
text_positioning_note: Left text goes over the suited man (left side), right text goes over the casually-dressed man with fanny pack (right side).
